process_details.description: The Inquire Contractor Information business process provides information about contractors to authorized inquirers. The process receives inquiries, validates the inquirer's authorization, retrieves contractor information, and provides the information to the inquirer.
results: Tracking information as needed for measuring performance and business activity monitoring.
process_steps: START: Receive inquiry about contractor information.
Validate inquirer's authorization to receive information.
Retrieve contractor information from data store.
END: Send contractor information to inquirer.
process_details.constraints: Access to contractor information must comply with privacy and security regulations.
failures: Inquirer not authorized to receive information.
performance_measures: Time to complete process = ___ days; ___ hours
